entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
